short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Safe Surfing protects you from phishing and malware attacks. It also blocks ads and trackers.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Safe Surfing is a browser extension that protects you from phishing and malware attacks by checking the websites you visit against a list of malicious pages stored in the cloud.
It also blocks ads and trackers, and prevents you from visiting sites that are known to be used for phishing and malware distribution.

Surf safely, with Safe Surfing!! 

Privacy Policy: https://safesurfing.xyz/privacy
EULA: https://safesurfing.xyz/eula
